name: TimeFix
description:
In this game you have to save a bunch of stupid scientists from dying. These are trying to kill themself like dodos. 

For this matter you get a device to rewind the time and prevent their deaths.

First you have to investigate so you canprevent their death using these informations.
Then you need to prevent their deaths by [for example] switching test tubes

Your only help is your friendly robotic Assistant Heinz.
